lines.text: Am I a wonderful actress like you?
Wonderful's a pretty big word for a little girl like you, but I think you'll do.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: When I grow up, will I be a wonderful actress?
If you work hard, perhaps. Do you want to be?
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: Rather! I'd like that better than anything. Don't you, Mommy?
You know what I like better than anything, better than the best roles I've ever had, better than the theaters and all the people in them, better than anything in this whole wide world, don't you?
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: Yes, Mommy, I do. It's Nana.
No.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: Maybe Elizabeth?
Yes, I guess that's who it is.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: No, Mommy, it isn't! It's me!
Of course it's you, my sweet.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: You don't know what a load it is off my mind, Stella, to see you happy like this. Who would ever thought in the old days that...
Mommy, how can days get old?
What question are you going to ask next? You run along and ask Nana.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans

lines.text: Nana...
You go and ask James. He knows everything.

That's the ticket, child. You come out in the garden with me and I'll tell you a story about a day that was so old, it had a long gray beard. In fact, that day was so old, it was almost as old as Nana.
But this isn't *like* her.
Nothing's like anyone till after they've done it.
We Americans are a fun-loving people; we pay most anything just to look at a freak. That's what I am now--a freak--a headline. I'm hot stuff. The public will eat me up, and I'll make 'em pay for it.
lines.character: Stella Parish, an alias of Elsa Jeffords, aka Aunt Lumilla Evans
